description: This file defines the interface for managing a collection of cameraDevice objects, specifically a container type 'cameraSet' that extends a linked list. It provides declarations for creating, destroying, manipulating, and querying cameraDevice objects within the set.

methods.name: createCameraSet
methods.description: Creates and initializes a new camera set (linked list of cameraDevice objects).

methods.name: destroyCameraSet
methods.description: Destroys the entire camera set and all contained cameraDevice objects.

methods.name: clearCameraSet
methods.description: Clears the contents of the camera set but leaves the container intact.

methods.name: appendCameraToSet
methods.description: Adds a cameraDevice to the set, with locking for thread safety.

methods.name: cameraSetIterate
methods.description: Iterates over all cameraDevices in the set, applying a callback function.

methods.name: findCameraByUuid
methods.description: Finds and returns a cameraDevice in the set by its UUID.

methods.name: findCameraByIpAddress
methods.description: Finds and returns a cameraDevice in the set by its IP address.

methods.name: destroyCameraDeviceFromSet
methods.description: Removes and destroys a specific cameraDevice from the set based on UUID.

methods.name: moveCameraDeviceToSet
methods.description: Moves a cameraDevice identified by UUID from one set to another.

methods.name: cameraSetCount
methods.description: Returns the number of cameraDevices in the set.
